title: Crash at signing transaction
body:
# Bug Report

## Problem

In some cases Status may crash during signing transaction. 
I can't say in what cases it is possible scenario for real users cc @rachelhamlin 

#### Expected behavior
no crash

#### Actual behavior
Status crashed

#### Notes
First time I see this error is 30/10/2019 on current nightly, couldn't reproduce manually. Caught by e2e in nightly.


### Reproduction


- Open Status
- Restore multiaccount with funds
- Send transaction
Full logcat and video: https://app.saucelabs.com/tests/db30fa3dc5c7479097e5e3dabd27dce0?auth=c16877bbb9f26392e69fd6ab04347912#78

### Additional Information

[comment]: # (Please do your best to fill this out.)
- Status version: nightly 30/10/2019
